duties_responsibilities.duty: Work directly with customers and be responsible for building software solutions to their problems.
Work across the stack — from designing data pipelines to building visualization frameworks.
Design novel solutions to difficult problems in the scientific data and workflows domain.
Shape the frontier of a critical market and work in a fast-paced environment with high uncertainty.
Lead by example and drive the direction of the company as it grows.
Work closely with scientists and learn more about science (no prior scientific experience required).
